QuestData.Title: Dawn's Blossom
QuestData.Description: Blood and Thunder! My axe hungers!$b$bWe won't return to Orgrimmar until every last Alliance is purged from this land.$b$bI will train these natives myself, if I have to. One way or another, this land will be made ready for Horde settlement.$b$bIn the meantime, their chief gave me this to pass on to you - a map and a message in some fancy script.$b$bDo what you must, but be quick about it.$b$bWar is brewing...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lorewalker Cho in Dawn's Blossom.$b$bSpeak to the flightmaster in Grookin Hill for passage.
